metadata.name: Process Memory Dump via RdrLeakDiag.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the Microsoft Windows Resource Leak Diagnostic tool "rdrleakdiag.exe" to dump process memory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rdrleakdiag.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rdrleakdiag.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-memdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/memdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–memdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—memdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―memdmp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fullmemdmp'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /p ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –p ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —p ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―p '))))

output.summary: Detects the use of the Microsoft Windows Resource Leak Diagnostic tool "rdrleakdiag.exe" to dump process memory
